channel.title: DevOps on Zachary Loeber
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on Zachary Loeber

item.title: Hugo - A DevOps Approach
item.description: I’ve updated my site to use hugo some time ago. Recently I’ve found some time to add a deployment pipeline for this site as well. This short article will cover how the pipeline code works and dive into multi-stage pipelines.

item.title: Devops: Tool of the day – Syncthing
item.description: Check out my new article on using syncthing as a devops productivity tool. Cheers!

item.title: DevOps – Automating Kubernetes Deployments
item.description: If you are deploying your own Kubernetes clusters you already know that: Kubernetes is hard But there is hope! There are a few great projects to keep an eye on in this space. I’ve covered some of them in an article you can read on the Lumen. Cheers!
